message: Let's split it evenly, it's a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I want the majority!
I'm not willing to give you the majority, let's keep negotiating!
A slight adjustment to your offer, but I'm still not giving up!
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm not there yet!
I'm not willing to give you a 70/30 split, let's keep pushing for a fairer share!
Getting closer to the middle ground, but I'm not giving up yet!

I'm not backing down, but I'm willing to meet you halfway!
You're running out of options, but I'm not getting any softer!
This is ridiculous, I'm not accepting a 10/90 split!
I'm making a final push for a more balanced split!
You're getting desperate, but I'm still not giving in!
This is absurd, I'm not accepting a 5/95 split!

No way, I'm not going to let you walk away with the whole pot!
